description: Enersize Oyj provides energy efficiency services and solutions for the process industry. The company is headquartered in Helsinki, Etela-Suomen. The company went IPO on 2017-06-15. The firm develops software for efficient compressed air production and usage through data acquisition, cooling systems analysis, problem identification and implementations of changes. The Company’s technology consists of three parts: sensor networks, cloud solutions and analysis tools. Sensor networks are developed together with the Company’s partners. Cloud solutions enable data storage for big data analysis through Enersize tools and automated algorithms. Enersize analysts work on data in real time to adjust and optimize customer's compressed air system. The Company’s main market is China. The Company’s main shareholder is Cleantech Invest Oyj.
name: Enersize Oyj
